WorkItem.ClosedComment: I'm not seeing this anymore.  Ciderglacier/Razorice/FallenCrusader should not be double stacking anymore.  Re-open targeting b19 or later if this is still occuring, then please include your character XML.
WorkItem.Description: Rawr seems to calculate Rune of Razorize for Dualwield twice, makes it best Rune while leveling because it stacks froststrike damage up to 21% if both weapons got the rune. Naturally its just faster on 10% and the second hand should get rune of the fallen crusader or berserking.
WorkItem.Summary: [DPSDK] Frost Dual Wield - Rune of Razorice

Comments.Message: Yes, razorice's model is somewhat flawed in that manner, but I'm not sure of an appropriate fix for it at this time. I'll look into it.
